title: Swimming at the 2004 Summer Paralympics – Women's 200 metre individual medley SM8
text:
The Women's 200 metre individual medley SM8 swimming event at the <a href="2004%20Summer%20Paralympics">2004 Summer Paralympics</a> was competed on 23 September. It was won by <a href="D%C3%B3ra%20P%C3%A1sztory">Dóra Pásztory</a>, representing .

"23 Sept. 2004, morning session"

Final round.
"23 Sept. 2004, evening session"
